請.definition: to ask; to invite; please (do sth); to treat (to a meal etc); to request

請便.definition: Please do as you wish!; You are welcome to do whatever you like!; Please make yourself at home.

請假條.definition: leave of absence request (from work or school)

請別見怪.definition: please don't be upset; no hard feelings; absit iniuria verbis; let injury by words be absent

請功.definition: to request recognition for sb's merits; to recommend sb for promotion or an award

請勿吸煙.definition: No smoking; Please do not smoke

請君入甕.definition: lit. please Sir, get into the boiling pot (idiom); fig. to give sb a taste of his own medicine

請多關照.definition: please treat me kindly (conventional greeting on first meeting)

請安.definition: to pay respects; to wish good health; in Qing times, a specific form of salutation (see also 打千[da3 qian1])

請客.definition: to give a dinner party; to entertain guests; to invite to dinner

請將不如激將.pinyin: qing3 jiang4 bu4 ru2 ji1 jiang4
請將不如激將.definition: lit. to dispatch a general is not as effective as to excite a general; fig. inciting people to action is more effective than dispatching orders

請援.definition: to request help; to appeal (for assistance)

請教.definition: to ask for guidance; to consult

請款.definition: to request payment (or reimbursement); to invoice

請求.definition: to request; to ask; request (CL:個|个[ge4])

請求寬恕.definition: to sue for mercy; to ask for forgiveness; begging for magnanimity

請神容易送神難.pinyin: qing3 shen2 rong2 yi4 song4 shen2 nan2
請神容易送神難.definition: it's easier to invite the devil in than to send him away

請纓.definition: to volunteer for military service; to offer oneself for an assignment

請罪.definition: to apologize humbly; to beg forgiveness

請辭.definition: to ask sb to resign from a post

請領.definition: to apply for (a subsidy, unemployment benefit etc)
